altername_name: Kung Fu Panda: Showdown der Legenden
name: Kung Fu Panda: Showdown of Legendary Legends
overview: Kung Fu Panda: Showdown of Legendary Legends is a fighting video game based on the Kung Fu Panda franchise. Conrad Vernon, Steele Gagnom, Sumalee Montano, James Hong and Randall Duk Kim reprise their roles from the film series. Mick Wingert and Amir Talai reprise their roles from the video game franchise and TV series. Kung Fu Panda: Showdown of Legendary Legends is a 2.5D fighting game and features characters from all the three movies including the main protagonist Po, "Furious Five" and all the villains. The gameplay is somewhat similar to the Super Smash Bros series
